content: repeat 4 times 16 nose instructions round 6 single_crochet in all 16 st 16 with black yarn round 7 decrease single_crochet in next 2 st repeat 4 times 12 begin nose in the center stitch between rounds 2 & 3 round 8 single_crochet in all 12 st 12 you will create the nose over four stitches insert round 9 decrease 6 times 6 needle into right most stitch of nose between rounds slip_stitch in first st of previous round fasten_off leaving 5 & 6 return needle to beginning stitch long tail insert needle into left most stitch of nose between stitch to head at round 8 facing downwards rounds 5 & 6 return needle to beginning stitch insert needle into right center stitch of nose between muzzle rounds 5 & 6 return needle to beginning stitch with gray yarn insert needle into left center stitch of nose between chain 2 rounds 5 & 6 return needle to beginning stitch round 1 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 5 repeat 3 times or until nose is to your liking round 2 increase 5 times 10 make a horizontal stitch across the top of the nose to round 3 single_crochet in next 2 st 3sc in each of the next 2 st fill in space repeat until nose is completely filled in single_crochet in next 3 st 3sc in next 2 st single_crochet in last st 18 weave in end round 4 single_crochet in all 18 st 18 round 5 increase single_crochet in next 5 st repeat 3 times 21 arms make 2 round 6 single_crochet in all 21 st 21 with black yarn round 7 single_crochet in first 6 st increase in next 2 st single_crochet in next 9 chain 2 st increase in next 2 st single_crochet in next 2 st 25 round 1 5 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 5 round 8 single_crochet in all 25 st 25 round 2 increase 5 times 10 slip_stitch in first st of previous round fasten_off leaving round 3 increase single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times 15 long tail round 4 single_crochet in all 15 st 15 stuff muzzle and attach to face change to dark gray yarn round 5 single_crochet in all 15 st 15 round 6 decrease single_crochet in next st repeat 5 times 10 stuff arm do not add any stuffing after this point or very little stuffing change to gray yarn round 7-14 single_crochet in all 10 st 10 slip_stitch in first st of previous round fasten_off leaving long tail stitch onto body at round 23 legs make 2 chain 2 with black yarn round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 round 2 increase 6 times 12 round 3 increase single_crochet in next st repeat 6 times 18 round 4 increase single_crochet in next 2 st repeat 6 times 24 change to dark gray yarn round 5-6 single_crochet in all 24 st 24 change to gray yarn round 7 single_crochet in first 6
